Package utils

utils package: containing useful classes and methods including I/O manipulation.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ClusterTestMaker The class ClusterTestMaker produces synthetic test-sets for clustering algorithms, in file formats the DataMgr class in this package can read.
DataFileAccessClt class implementing clients for requesting reading a range of vectors residing in a remote file in a remote file-system.
DataFileAccessSrv The server is responsible for accessing data files residing in its local file-system (or any file-system it has network access to), according to requests it receives over the network via sockets, from DataFileAccessClt objects and returning the requested vector of popt4jlib.VectorIntf objects to the requestor.
DataMgr The class acts as an I/O Manager class for saving and loading data for complex objects in the library such as Graph, HGraph, and properties HashMap objects.
Debug A class to help in debugging of the code.
DIMACSASCIIFormatGraphFileMaker utility class that takes as argument a graph file and converts it into a file whose format is the DIMACS GRAPH ASCII FORMAT, or vice-versa.
GraphPacking2MIPConverter Convert a graph (1- or 2-) packing problem to a MIP, in lp format.
IntSet auxiliary class allowing comparison of sets of integers.
LightweightParams helper class that allows searching parameters hierarchically by name Title: popt4jlib Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011 Company:
Messenger class controlling messaging to various output streams.
Pair utility class holding pairs of objects.
PairIntDouble utility class with the same semantics as the Pair class, but restricted so that the first object in the Pair is an int and the second a double.
PairIntDoublePool The class is responsible for maintaining a sufficiently large array of PairIntDouble objects, and there will be a pool for each thread of execution.
PairIntDoubleThreadLocalPools auxiliary class using the ThreadLocal mechanism to create thread-local PairIntDouble object pools.
PairObjDouble utility class with the same semantics as PairIntDouble except the first (key) object in a PairObjDouble can be any Object.
Params helper class that allows searching parameters hierarchically by name Title: popt4jlib Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011 Company:
RandomBallGraphMaker builds the dual of the collision graph of an ad-hoc wireless network whose nodes have been randomly placed on the surface of a sphere.
RandomGraphMaker builds the dual graph of the collision graph corresponding to an ad-hoc wireless network with nodes randomly placed in a normalized H x W rectangle, and with radius of transmission either constant or uniformly distributed in [r/2, 3r/2].
RandomGraphMaker2 builds a random graph, given the number of nodes and the average node degree in the graph (and optionally of course, the random seed).
RandomGraphMaker3 builds a random graph $G_{|V|,p}, given the number of nodes and the probability of any edge (i,j) existing in the graph (and optionally of course, the random seed).
RndUtil class controlling random number generation.
WMaxSATFileMaker utility class that takes as argument a graph file and converts it into a file whose format is accepted as an input file for a weighted MAX-SAT problem solver.
 

Package utils Description

utils package: containing useful classes and methods including I/O manipulation.
